description: Since 1931, Capital Group associates have been helping people take control of their financial futures. We do so by staying true to our core beliefs, our approach to investing and our commitment to community. Today, we're one of the world's largest investment management organizations, managing $2.2 trillion in assets. We believe a financial goal is more than a number for our clients. It may represent a new home, a small business, a comfortable retirement or a college education. We help our clients go from dreaming to doing by focusing on our core beliefs and being grounded in our core values. In doing so, we have been helping people get from "Can I?" to "I can" for over 90 years.
